name: Goblin Hunter Wizard Emona
description:
In the action scene, when you defeat an enemy with magic, a circle called "attribute sphere" will appear.
When two attribute spheres overlap, "chain magic" will occur, and powerful magic will occur.
Defeating an enemy with this chain magic triples the drop rate of coins and items.
All event scenes are dot animation!
Events work in every scene!
Furthermore, on the memory CG screen (title → memory)
Animation speed can also be changed in 10% intervals!
If you turn on the "hide parts" setting in the settings, a mysterious light will appear in your parts, making it possible to stream live broadcasts on YouTube without worry!?
Magic power recovers by drinking semen!
Wizard Emona consumes MP each time she shoots her magic,
Recover MP by taking in his semen by near her baggageman Detao pulling her cart.
The defeat scene is also animated!
If either Emona, who is the operating character, or Detao, who follows, is defeated, it will be an H scene.
Emona's defeat scene depends on the weapon she has equipped.
There are differences in staff weapons
There is a difference in the orb system
There are other independent H scenes with special weapons.
As the stage progresses, the squeezing volunteer scene changes
It seems that Hoon Etty, a tool shop clerk, wants magical semen as an item material.
As the stage progresses, it becomes more and more excessive...
